name: lightness of being
description:
A simple yet challenging game with a relaxing, meditative ambience. You must juggle aspects of life to survive as long as you can. This is intended to be a bit philosophical but not too cryptic, to get players thinking about themselves and others. All you can do is type.

This is a game made for Ludum Dare 29, with a little polish and play testing added.

Let me know what you think on Twitter at @llnesisll!
